com.xhive.core.interfaces
Interface XhiveGrammarPoolIf

public interface XhiveGrammarPoolIf

X-Hive/DB uses Xerces Java 2 to parse and validate documents with XML Schema. Xerces stores validation information in schema grammar. This grammar is used to enable XML schema support in X-Hive/DB. For performance reasons, a grammarpool is used to cache XML Schema grammar. This interface gives acces to the grammarpool.

Each catalog has its own grammarpool to cache the grammar built from its models.

The grammarpool is cleared on the start of a new transaction. The grammarpool itself can be used during the lifetime of the session.

Grammar are automatically loaded into the grammarpool when:

  • parsing documents with validation
  • validating documents
  • parsing schema documents
  • retrieving schema information of documents (PSVI interfaces)

An XML Schema Grammar is identified by its target namespace. As a result, only one grammar of a specific target namespace can be stored in a grammarpool. Users are adviced not to store more than one schema with the same target namespace in one catalog.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.1

Method Detail

cacheGrammars

void cacheGrammars(java.lang.String grammarType,
                   org.apache.xerces.xni.grammars.Grammar[] grammars)
Add grammar to the grammarpool. Grammar with the same target namespace in the grammarpool are replaced by the new grammar. Only grammar of type "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" are loaded into the grammarpool

Parameters:
grammarType - the type of the grammar
grammars - the added grammar
Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.1

retrieveGrammar

org.apache.xerces.xni.grammars.Grammar retrieveGrammar(org.apache.xerces.xni.grammars.XMLGrammarDescription desc)
Retrieve a grammar that is identified by the grammardescription. Use an instance of class org.apache.xerces.impl.xs.XSDDescription to identify the grammar. The targetnamespace must be set.

Parameters:
desc - an instance of org.apache.xerces.impl.xs.XSDDescription
Returns:
the grammar found
Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.1

retrieveGrammarSet

org.apache.xerces.xni.grammars.Grammar[] retrieveGrammarSet(java.lang.String grammarType)
Retrieve all grammar contained by the grammarpool. Only schema of type "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" can be retrieved.

Parameters:
grammarType - the type of the grammar
Returns:
all grammar of the given type
Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.1

removeGrammar

void removeGrammar(org.apache.xerces.xni.grammars.XMLGrammarDescription desc)
Remove the grammar identified by the grammardescription. Use an instance of class org.apache.xerces.impl.xs.XSDDescription to identify the grammar. The targetnamespace must be set.

Parameters:
desc - an instance of org.apache.xerces.impl.xs.XSDDescription
Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.1

clear

void clear()
Remove all grammar from the grammarpool

Since:
X-Hive/DB 4.1
